SectionBody.Text: Every motorcycle and every motor-driven cycle when operated upon a highway shall comply with the requirements and limitations of:

Subsection.Text: Section 316.271(1) and (2) on the requirement for horns and warning devices.
Section 316.271(3) on the requirement for the use of horns.
Section 316.271(4) on the requirement for sirens, whistles, and bells.
Section 316.271(5) on the requirement for theft alarms.
Section 316.271(6) on the requirement for emergency vehicles.
Section 316.272 on the requirement for mufflers and prevention of noise.
Section 316.294 on the requirement for mirrors.

SectionBody.Text: A violation of this section is a noncriminal traffic infraction, punishable as a nonmoving violation as provided in chapter 318.
